comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/13927
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/771458f724a4ff1172b6b1a72d8b727fa07b94be
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 771458f724a4ff1172b6b1a72d8b727fa07b94be
Author: Joe Gordon <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Oct 1 15:25:47 2012 -0700

    Remove outdated moduleauthor tags
    
    The moduelauthor tags are used by the docs to see who wrote what.
    But many of them are outdated and wrong.
    
    fixes bug 1044578
    
    Change-Id: I9cc27430c906d1418faf28e1b53f6306c62e8f98
